pbi:mashup.document:
section Section1;
shared #"BLM_Source" = let
    
      
    getConstellationIssues = (STARTAT) => 
    let
        Source = 
         Json.Document(
           Web.Contents(
             "https://constellation.soprasteria.com",
             [RelativePath="/jira1/rest/api/2/search?expand=changelog",
                Query = [startAt = Text.From(STARTAT), 
                       maxResults="50", 
                       jql = "project="&BLM_PROJECT_NAMES, 
                       Timeout="03:00:00"]
             ]
                       )
                      ),
        Success = Record.ToTable(Source)

    in
        Success,

    getPage = (project as text, page as text) =>
    let
    Source = Json.Document(Web.Contents("https://constellation.soprasteria.com",
        
        [RelativePath="jira1/rest/api/2/search?jql=project IN (" & project & ")&startAt=" & page] 
          
            )),
    #"Converted to Table" = Record.ToTable(Source)
    in
        #"Converted to Table",

    Source = Json.Document(Web.Contents("https://constellation.soprasteria.com", [RelativePath="jira1/rest/api/2/search?jql=project in (" & BLM_PROJECT_NAMES & ")"])),
    #"Vers la Table" = Record.ToTable(Source),
      Liste = {0..Source[total]},
    #"Vers la Table1" = Table.FromList(Liste, Splitter.SplitByNothing(), null, null, ExtraValues.Error),
    #"Type modifié" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Vers la Table1",{{"Column1", Int64.Type}}),
    #"Colonne personnalisée" = Table.AddColumn(#"Type modifié", "Custom", each [Column1] / 50),
    #"Fractionner la colonne par délimiteur" = Table.SplitColumn(Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Colonne personnalisée", {{"Custom", type text}}, "en-US"), "Custom", Splitter.SplitTextByDelimiter(".", QuoteStyle.Csv), {"Custom.1", "Custom.2"}),
    #"Type modifié 1" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Fractionner la colonne par délimiteur",{{"Custom.1", Int64.Type}, {"Custom.2", Int64.Type}}),
    #"Filtrer les lignes" = Table.SelectRows(#"Type modifié 1", each ([Custom.2] = null)),
    #"Supprimer Colonnes" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Filtrer les lignes",{"Custom.1", "Custom.2"}),
    #"Type modifié 2" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Supprimer Colonnes",{{"Column1", type text}}),
    #"Colonnes renommée" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Type modifié 2",{{"Column1", "startAt"}}),
    #"Appeller fonction personnalisé" = Table.AddColumn(#"Colonnes renommée", "get Constallation Issues", each getPage(BLM_PROJECT_NAMES,[startAt])),
    #"Développer get Constellation Issues" = Table.ExpandTableColumn(#"Appeller fonction personnalisé", "get Constallation Issues", {"Name", "Value"}, {"Name", "Value"}),
    #"Filtrer les lignes1" = Table.SelectRows(#"Développer get Constellation Issues", each ([Name] = "issues")),
    #"Supprimer Colonnes1" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Filtrer les lignes1",{"startAt"}),
    #"Développer Value" = Table.ExpandListColumn(#"Supprimer Colonnes1", "Value"),
    #"Développer Value1" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Développer Value", "Value", {"key", "fields", "changelog"}, {"key", "fields", "changelog"})
in
    #"Développer Value1";
shared #"BLM_Issues" = let
    Source = BLM_Source,
    #"Développer fields" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(Source, "fields", {"fixVersions", "customfield_10105", "timeestimate", "assignee", "status", "issuetype", "timespent", "project", "customfield_10398", "customfield_10307", "created", "timeoriginalestimate", "summary", "customfield_10000"}, {"fields.fixVersions", "fields.customfield_10105", "fields.timeestimate", "fields.assignee", "fields.status", "fields.issuetype", "fields.timespent", "fields.project", "fields.customfield_10398", "fields.customfield_10307", "fields.created", "fields.timeoriginalestimate", "fields.summary", "fields.customfield_10000"}),
    #"Développer fields.issuetype" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Développer fields", "fields.issuetype", {"name"}, {"fields.issuetype.name"}),
    #"Développer fields.project" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Développer fields.issuetype", "fields.project", {"name"}, {"fields.project.name"}),
    #"Type modifié" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Développer fields.project",{{"fields.created", type datetimezone}}),
    #"Lignes filtrées" = Table.SelectRows(#"Type modifié", each [fields.created] > #datetimezone(2019, 9, 2, 0, 0, 0, 2, 0)),
    #"Développer fields.customfield_10398" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Lignes filtrées", "fields.customfield_10398", {"value"}, {"fields.customfield_10398.value"}),
    #"Type modifié 3" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Développer fields.customfield_10398",{{"fields.timeestimate", Int64.Type}, {"fields.timespent", Int64.Type}, {"fields.timeoriginalestimate", Int64.Type}}),
    #"Développer fields.assignee" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Type modifié 3", "fields.assignee", {"displayName"}, {"fields.assignee.displayName"}),
    #"Développer fields.status" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Développer fields.assignee", "fields.status", {"name"}, {"fields.status.name"}),
    #"Colonne personnalisée" = Table.AddColumn(#"Développer fields.status", "IssueLink", each JIRA_ADDRESS & "/projects/" & BLM_PROJECT_NAMES & "/issues/" & [key]),
    #"Développer fields.fixVersions" = Table.ExpandListColumn(#"Colonne personnalisée", "fields.fixVersions"),
    #"Développer fields.fixVersions1" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Développer fields.fixVersions", "fields.fixVersions", {"name"}, {"fields.fixVersions.name"}),
    #"Développer fields.customfield_10000" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Développer fields.fixVersions1", "fields.customfield_10000", {"value"}, {"fields.customfield_10000.value"}),
    #"Colonnes renommées" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Développer fields.customfield_10000",{{"fields.fixVersions.name", "Version"}, {"fields.customfield_10000.value", "Catégorie"}, {"fields.customfield_10398.value", "Type"}})
in
    #"Colonnes renommées";
shared #"01-COUNT ISSUES JIRA PROJECT" = let
    Source = Json.Document(Web.Contents("https://constellation.soprasteria.com", [RelativePath="jira1/rest/api/2/search", Query = [startAt="0", maxResults="1", jql = "project="&BLM_PROJECT_NAMES,Timeout="03:00:00"]]))
in
    Source;
shared #"02-JIRA PROJECT" = let
       
        getConstellationIssues = (STARTAT) => 
    let
        Source = 
         Json.Document(
           Web.Contents(
             "https://constellation.soprasteria.com",
             [RelativePath="/jira1/rest/api/2/search?expand=changelog",
                Query = [startAt = Text.From(STARTAT), 
                       maxResults="50", 
                       jql = "project="&BLM_PROJECT_NAMES, 
                       Timeout="03:00:00"]
             ]
                       )
                      ),
        Success = Record.ToTable(Source)

    in
        Success,

       
    getWorklog = (id) =>
    let
        Source = 
           Json.Document(
              Web.Contents(
                "https://constellation.soprasteria.com",
                [RelativePath="/jira1/rest/api/2/issue/"&Text.From(id)&"/worklog"]
                  //[Timeout=Duration.FromText("03:00:00")]
                
                          )
                        ),
        Result = Record.ToTable(Source)
     in
        Result,


       
        //Codigo que genera comoresultado una pagina simple
        contents = #"01-COUNT ISSUES JIRA PROJECT",
    Liste = List.Generate(()=>0, each _ < #"contents"[total], each _ +50),
    #"Vers la Table" = Table.FromList(Liste, Splitter.SplitByNothing(), null, null, ExtraValues.Error),
    #"Colonnes renommées" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Vers la Table",{{"Column1", "StartAt"}}),
    #"Appeller une fonction personnalisée" = Table.AddColumn(#"Colonnes renommées", "get Constellation Issues", each getConstellationIssues([StartAt])),
    #"Développer get Constellation Issues" = Table.ExpandTableColumn(#"Appeller une fonction personnalisée", "get Constellation Issues", {"Name", "Value"}, {"get Constellation Issues.Name", "get Constellation Issues.Value"}),
    #"Filtrer les lignes1" = Table.SelectRows(#"Développer get Constellation Issues", each ([get Constellation Issues.Name] = "issues")),
    #"Supprimer les colonnes1" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Filtrer les lignes1",{"StartAt", "get Constellation Issues.Name"}),
    #"Développer get Constellation Issues.Value" = Table.ExpandListColumn(#"Supprimer les colonnes1", "get Constellation Issues.Value"),

        #"Modifier le Type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Développer Generics",{{"Column1.id", Int64.Type}}),

shared #"0210-WORKLOG" = let
    #"JIRA Project ID" = let
    Source = #"02-JIRA PROJECT"
  in
    Table.SelectColumns(Source,{"ID","ISSUE","WORKLOG"}),
    #"Développer WORKLOG" = Table.ExpandTableColumn(#"JIRA Project ID", "WORKLOG", {"Name", "Value"}, {"WORKLOG.Name", "WORKLOG.Value"}),
    #"Filtrer les lignes" = Table.SelectRows(#"Développer WORKLOG", each ([WORKLOG.Name] = "worklogs")),
    #"Développer list WORKLOG" = Table.ExpandListColumn(#"Filtrer les lignes", "WORKLOG.Value"),
    #"Filtrer les lignes1" = Table.SelectRows(#"Développer list WORKLOG", each ([WORKLOG.Value] <> null)),
    #"Développer regs WORKLOG" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Filtrer les lignes1", "WORKLOG.Value", {"self", "author", "updateAuthor", "comment", "created", "updated", "started", "timeSpent", "timeSpentSeconds", "id", "issueId"}, {"self", "author", "updateAuthor", "comment", "created", "updated", "started", "timeSpent", "timeSpentSeconds", "id.1", "issueId"}),
    #"Développer Author Worklog" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Développer regs WORKLOG", "author", {"name", "emailAddress", "displayName"}, {"name", "emailAddress", "displayName"}),
    #"Développer updateAuthor Worklog" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Développer Author Worklog", "updateAuthor", {"name", "emailAddress", "displayName"}, {"name.1", "emailAddress.1", "displayName.1"}),
    #"Supprimer les colonnes" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Développer updateAuthor Worklog",{"WORKLOG.Name", "self", "issueId"}),
    #"Supprimer les colonnes1" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Supprimer les colonnes",{{"name", "Author"}, {"emailAddress", "Author Email"}, {"displayName", "Author Name"}, {"name.1", "Update Author"}, {"emailAddress.1", "Update Author Email"}, {"displayName.1", "Update Author Name"}, {"comment", "Comment"}, {"created", "Created Date"}, {"updated", "Updated Date"}, {"started", "Startde Date"}, {"timeSpent", "Time Spent"}, {"timeSpentSeconds", "Time Spent Seconds"}, {"id.1", "WorklogID"}}),
    #"Changer Type DateTypeZone" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Supprimer les colonnes1",{{"Created Date", type datetimezone}, {"Updated Date", type datetimezone}, {"Startde Date", type datetimezone}}),
    #"Changer Type DateType" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Changer Type DateTypeZone",{{"Created Date", type datetime}, {"Updated Date", type datetime}, {"Startde Date", type datetime}}),
    #"Colonnes personnalisée" = Table.AddColumn(#"Changer Type DateType", "Time Spent Days", each [Time Spent Seconds]/28800),
    #"Changer Type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Colonnes personnalisée",{{"Time Spent Days", type number}, {"Time Spent Seconds", Int64.Type}, {"Startde Date", type date}}),
    #"Colonne personnalisée Semaine de l'année" = Table.AddColumn(#"Changer Type", "Semaine/Mois/Année", each Text.Combine({Number.ToText(Date.Year([Startde Date])),"-",Number.ToText(Date.Month([Startde Date])),"-","S",Number.ToText(Date.WeekOfYear([Startde Date]),"0#")},""))
in
    #"Colonne personnalisée Semaine de l'année";
shared #"DateMAJ" = let
    Source = Table.FromRows({{DateTime.LocalNow()}},{"Mise à jour"}),
    #"Type modifié" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Source,{{"Mise à jour", type date}})
in
    #"Type modifié";
